{ "@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "WebSite", "url": "", "potentialAction": { "@type": "SearchAction", "target": "?q={search_term_string}", "query-input": "required name=search_term_string" } } Global Styles Post/Static Page Styles Bundle (Comments) Bundle (Widgets) Options (Warning, it can cause crashing!) /*! => Theme Name: Anime.xml Pro => Theme URI: https://zkreations.com/anime-xml => Author: Daniel Abel M. (Copyright 2018 zkreations) => Author URI: https://instagram.com/danie.abel => Version: 3.0.5 => License: Creative Commons Atribucion-NoComercial 4.0 Internacional => License URI: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/ */ /*Fix: Unnecessary elements removed*/ .widget-item-control, .item-control.blog-admin, .continue,.loadmore, .thread-chrome.thread-collapsed, .singleton-element:not(.cookie-choices-info), .noAllowNewComments .comment-actions {display:none} /*Fix: Show lightbox*/ .CSS_LIGHTBOX{z-index:90001!important} /*Fix: Image responsive*/ a[imageanchor]:not([style*=float]) { margin-right: 0 !important; margin-left: 0 !important; } img[data-original-height], img[data-original-width] {height: auto;} /*Fix: Comment Editor*/ #comment-editor{ border:0; width:100%; min-height:220px } /*Fix: Responsive Comments*/ .fb-comments, .fb-comments span, .fb-comments iframe, .cmt_iframe_holder, .cmt_iframe_holder iframe { width:100%!important; display:block!important } /* Configurations ==================== Variable definitions ==================== */ body{background:$(body.background);font-family:'$(font.text.family)',Roboto,sans-serif}.container{max-width:$(width.content)}.card__image::before,.gallery__title::after,.nav__menu ul,.nav__menu>li:hover,.skin-bg,.skin-bg-hover:hover,.widget-title,.widget>h2,.wjs-item.is-active{background-color:$(main.color)}::-moz-selection{background-color:$(main.color)}::selection{background-color:$(main.color)}@media (max-width:991px){.nav__menu li .is-active{background-color:$(main.color)}}.drop-caps:first-letter,.skin-color,.skin-color-hover:hover,.tagsList__num,a,a:hover{color:$(main.linkColor)}.card__data a.meta__item:hover{color:$(main.linkColor)}.footer__primary,.post-body blockquote{border-color:$(main.color)}.wjs-tab:not(.tab-vertical) .tab-header{border-bottom:2px solid $(main.color)}.tab-vertical .tab-header{border-right:2px solid $(main.color)}.h1,.h2,.h3,.h4,.h5,.h6,.skin-color-title,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{color:$(body.colorTitle)}.skin-color-text{color:$(body.colorText)}.skin-main-bg{background-color:$(body.bg)}.skin-font,.widget-title,.widget>h2{font-family:'$(font.logo.family)',Oswald,sans-serif}@media (min-width:992px){.skin-box{padding:28px}.skin-box--menu{padding-left:28px;padding-right:28px}.main__general .widget:last-child{margin-bottom:28px}.bottom-space{padding-bottom:28px}.header__logo{padding-left:28px;padding-right:28px}}.header__wrapper{background-color:$(header.bg)}.logo__title .logo__link{color:$(header.colorLogo);font-family:'$(font.logo.family)',Oswald,sans-serif;font-size:$(font.logo.size);font-weight:700;line-height:1}.logo__descripcion{color:$(header.colorDesc);font-family:'$(font.desc.family)',Roboto,sans-serif;font-size:$(font.desc.size);font-weight:500}@media (max-width:767px){.logo__link{font-size:20px!important}.logo__descripcion{font-size:14px!important}}#HTML100,.header__nav,.nav__menu{background:$(menu.bg)}.header__logo{padding-top:28px;padding-bottom:28px}.nav__menu a{color:$(menu.color)}.nav__menu .is-parent a .is-arrow::after,.nav__menu ul .is-parent a .is-arrow::after{border-color:$(menu.icon)}.nav__menu a i{color:$(menu.icon)}@media (min-width:992px){.sidebar{width:$(width.sidebar)}.blog{width:calc(100% - $(width.sidebar) - 28px)}}.gallery__title{font-family:'$(font.logo.family)',Oswald,sans-serif}.post-heading>span,.widget-title,.widget>h2{color:$(gadget.color)}.main .widget-title::after,.main .widget>h2::after,.post-heading{background:$(gadget.title)}.skin-i{color:$(gadget.icon)}.footer__primary{background:$(footer.primaryBg)}.footer__social-list a{color:$(footer.shareColor)}.footer__copy{color:$(footer.copyColor)}.copy__attribution a{color:$(footer.linkColor)}.footer__links{background:$(footer.linksBg)}.footer__links-list i{color:$(footer.IconColor)}.footer__links-list a{color:$(footer.links)}.card__title a{color:$(post.titleColor)}.card__data{padding:28px}.card__content{background:$(post.bg)}.card__data .meta__item{color:$(post.footerColor)}.card__descripcion{color:$(post.snippetColor)} body#layout .blog,body#layout .sidebar{width:50%}body#layout .noSidebar{width:100%}body#layout .skin-left{float:left}body#layout .skin-right{float:right}body#layout div#LinkList100{float:left;margin-right:2%;width:58%}body#layout div#Text100{float:right;width:40%} 0 -1 false false BEHIND 0
